issue.title: Gas and vent artifacts not scoring on urban1

content.raw: Thanks Arthur.  I just tried with levels set to false, and indeed, the artifacts that didn’t work yesterday are now working.  We were also running into an issue that I think is new in urban where you have to be fully in the staging area to report artifacts \(not just within comms range of the ground station/pose service\).  We are working around this issue.
content.html: Thanks Arthur. I just tried with levels set to false, and indeed, the artifacts that didn’t work yesterday are now working. We were also running into an issue that I think is new in urban where you have to be fully in the staging area to report artifacts (not just within comms range of the ground station/pose service). We are working around this issue.
